Reviews.Title: Great Android phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is going to be a short review without a lot of specs and technical details as that can be found elsewhere on this site for the same make and model.I am a long time Samsung phone owner who has followed the development of their technology over the past 6-7 years. The Samsung Galaxy S III Mini Gt-I8190 by far exceeds the phones I have previously had, and it is a joy to work with.Most importantly for me: The call quality is great; It gets 3G/H on AT&T; prepaid GoPhone where I live (in a rural basement apartment) and at work, despite being an "international" model (It comes with a European charger with a US adapter). My former phone, another international Samsung model did not get 3G.It is my first cell phone with dual cameras, and I love the fact that I can Skype on it. The camera/ picture quality is better than on any of my former phones, and it has a flash :) I also like the fact that it is not the biggest phone out there.All in all a great phone; very glad I got it!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing - delivered malfunctioning device
Reviews.Author: Zlatan Sabic
Reviews.Content: My wife had the same phone, broke the screen. She was so happy with Samsung S3 Mini that she wanted the same one. But, first night the device turned itself off for no reason while charging. Next night too (connected to different charger). After two days, started turning itself off even when not charging. I checked the usual suspects - the battery has solid contact, the SIM card and SD card were not losing contact. It was simply malfunctioning.So, this phone model is really, really good, we like it a lot, but this particular seller sent us the broken phone,It's not one star only because return worked well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Cledimar Rivero
Reviews.Content: I think it was just lucky to have found a good selled because I have heard and read a lot of horror stories about phones that came damaged or that were not compatible with the company that were intended to be used, so i really am thankful that my phone turned out to be perfect in every aspect. My only complaint is that I should have bought it with a lot more space because my kids keep wanting to add more and more games and it really can't fit them all.

Reviews.Title: All was great!
Reviews.Author: MgRgS
Reviews.Content: I like it! Had a good price and I can use it in my country (Peru) :) Samsung is one of my favorite brand

Reviews.Title: Everything they said it ws
Reviews.Author: jesus cervantes
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to set up. I purchased this phone to take on a long trip to central america. I was able to set it up for service in 3 different countries and i gave it to a friend when i left. She changed the language to spanish with out any problems. I was also surprised how quicky it was shipped to my door ( 4 days!!)

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: The phone was working fine at first, but now the power button gets stuck into the phone. I can not turn off the screen on my phone now or lock the phone, I have to wait for the screen to time-out. I contacted the seller and they won't do anything to fix it. I contacted Samsung and they said they do not have the knowledge to fix the phone because it's an international model. Definitely not worth almost $300. DON'T BUY!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone.
Reviews.Author: Jay Jimenez
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone for our daughter.  She loves it.  The camera is good.  The size is great.  Overall a great phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love?
Reviews.Author: Just Human
Reviews.Content: Unlocked and ready to use with sim card.  Excellent battery life, great OS, and easy to use.  If you want big and bulky this is not for you.  Almost identical in size to iPod Touch. Great color!

Reviews.Title: Look like it was a defected one.
Reviews.Author: drogba "vi-rs"
Reviews.Content: Everything looked good until I actually started using the phone and to realize that people one the receiving end of the call are hearing me not clearly......It's though it's a muffled sound.....

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: It got here in less than a week when they shipped it to me and i live on a small island so imagine how fast it could get to you guys in the mainland, lol. I am super satisfied with the choice i made. I had an S1 fascinate and it kept lagging so i decided to get an s3 but it was too expensive. I gotta admit, i was thinking twice about ordering this phone but i decided to go with it and i'm happy with it. I can see emojis with it too, lol. I haven't activated it yet though so i hope it's still as good as it is when i activate it and get to use everything else except the wifi. :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S III Mini I8190 Red / Gt-i8190 S3 Mini , 4.1 Jelly Bean ,4...
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone, except for the only problem that I've been having with the network. I'm not been able to get my 3G and 4G network no matter where I am and I have a good Network service.  I have T-Mobile and I'm having a lot of problems with the networks because the phone is unlock.  Other than that, I would recommend this phone to anyone who wants to buy it.

Reviews.Title: My first smartphone and I love it!
Reviews.Author: Rad4chica
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use with Consumer Cellular and it's great! You would not believe how low our phone bill is now! No problems with the phone, except the weather widget is set to Celsius and I can't figure out how to change it. I am VERY pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: kiki
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for a year now and I have no problems so far. It works well in the Caribbean.

Reviews.Title: New and somewhat pleasant transition
Reviews.Author: Sue-Ann
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I purchased another phone brand. For years I have been a die-hard supporter of Nokia, however the Lumia 800 has disappointed me beyond words can describe. I couldn't afford the Samsung Galaxy S4 mini, hence the reason I chose this one. Thus far im impressed by all its features and simplicity.  My only hindrances have been that the phone has frozen on me a couple of times, causing me to do force shutdowns. I hope it gets better

Reviews.Title: Ordered a new phone, but was sent a used one. Amazon remedied the situation ASAP.
Reviews.Author: L. E. "L"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased what was supposed to be a brand new phone. I noticed after I opened it that the clear protective stickers on the outside of the phone looked like they'd been reapplied. They had bubbles under them and dust. Then I noticed the seal on the outside that says "do not accept if this seal is broken" had another one underneath it, so clearly it had been broken and replaced once.Amazon immediately replied as they fulfilled the purchase (from the seller Top 10 Cell). They kindly offered me the options of a full return,  an exchange for a new phone at the same price, or keeping the phone at a 30% discount. I did decide to return it, as I didn't trust it at that point. Amazon was VERY helpful with this. If they hadn't fulfilled the item, I would have had to go completely through the seller for help.  The seller themselves contacted me after I left them bad feedback. They wanted to tell me that they open the phones before sending them out to be sure all of the accessories are in the box. Clearly that makes no sense for a brand new phone, for obvious reasons.My previous phone was the Galaxy SII, which I loved. I think Samsung phones are great, but beware of receiving a used phone when ordering a new one.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Tianna tettis
Reviews.Content: phone works great i have tmobile only 2 small issues i had was i need a bigger sd card from my current one i had small 20$ fee and the charger could' fit my american ports

Reviews.Title: phone charger
Reviews.Author: kyle mitchell
Reviews.Content: the charger does not work will i be able to get an replacement of the charger  if it is possible

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Hao Li
Reviews.Content: My wife likes it very much. It has all the claimed functions and everything works well. I may buy another for myself.

Reviews.Title: It's perfect thanks
Reviews.Author: Maria Fernanda Marcano
Reviews.Content: Perfect thank you . The cellphone it's great. The camera it's so cool be cause the pictures are so beautiful

Reviews.Title: Perfect present for your significant other if Red is her favorite color!
Reviews.Author: Glenn Mora
Reviews.Content: Item described as seller offered. Device and accessories came in a really good conditions. I already have a Samsung G S3 but this mini is specifically for my wife so I know what I bought. Notice for those who mentioned that this device does not have Spanish language; I must say that it does come in this language so do not have any concern about this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ismaira Rivera
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, the color is gorgeous and its technical characteristics are very good. I highly recommend it. i love it

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I bought my S3 mini from Wireless Everything seller. It works perfectly and came excellently packed.Though I regret a bit about the color chosen, because it's difficult to choose accesories that combine with it, I LOVE the cellphone!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Radhica B.
Reviews.Content: happy with this phone...perfect for me...and the colour looks even better in real..i dont like big phones or too small ones but this one has a perfect size..

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Gilberto Villalon
Reviews.Content: Pretty nice phone! Amazed with the screen, sound and how the screen reacts so quickly with a minimum touch. The camera is great too! Couldn't be happier!!

Reviews.Title: this version cellphone have spanish lenguage?
Reviews.Author: cris
Reviews.Content: this version cellphone have spanish lenguage? because buy this model and I find it hard to put it in Spanish

Reviews.Title: The Best Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: Nan
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  It has exceeded all my expectations.  It has so many fancy features that I don't even use because it's overwhelming.  But all the features that I do use are fabulous.  I even have a movie library on my phone and can watch movies in airports/airplanes, etc.  And I read my Kindle books on my phone.  I strongly recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: The product arrived as it was sold. It is a great Android mobile.
Reviews.Author: Luiz Henrique Jorge Machado
Reviews.Content: The product has a great quality and everything arrived well. The box was in perfect conditions as all the products. The mobile and its accessories are new ones. I recommend the seller for everyone in Amazon.comAbout the product, it is a great option for whom think that Galaxy S3 is a big one. It is thin as the other one but is smaller. However, the processor and the memory are fewer than the Normal S3. The Android system is really good.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely happy with the device
Reviews.Author: Mairano Cuore Alejandro Carlos "Ale Mai"
Reviews.Content: actually bought it for my GF and she's delighted. It was a big upgrade actually... from some Nokia C6-01 which kept on failing... this one works great.

Reviews.Title: I am happy whit this product
Reviews.Author: CHARLOTH DIAZ
Reviews.Content: The smartphone arrived in really good conditions. What I saw in the picture was what I received, the color, the specifications. Everything was perfect. But I had a situation. I was looking for this smartphone in amazon, and I found it, in that moment i just found one s3 mini in red and I added to my cart whit a price. When I finished to select all my products and i wanted to pay it, the cellphone was more expensive. I agree if I add it to my wish list, of course the price can changes. But I just took too few minutes to review my complete order and verify if I can buy more things. This situations makes me review all my cart and I can't buy something else. Because the product got about 10 dollars more. And I had to release another product that was on my cart previously. I expect my situation can be considered and amazon can give us a better service.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed !!
Reviews.Author: vincent abato
Reviews.Content: The telephone arrived with all documents, instructions etc, in Czech language. Samsung customer service refused to help or provide information because the phone was not purchased from a recognized provider. The battery life is unacceptable. It doesn't hold a charge for eight (8) hours even with very minimal use. I would never have purchased this phone if I knew that I would not receive any warranty or even basic information from the manufacturer. I would gladly send it back for a full refund.Vincent Abato
